original_title: Jeanine Pirro's office ends D.C. rifle and shotgun felony prosecutions policy | Fox News
article_summary: U.S. Attorney for D.C., Jeanine Pirro, announces a new policy that will no longer result in felony charges for possession of rifles or shotguns in Washington D.C., following guidance from the Justice Department. This change is part of President Trump's efforts to reduce crime in the city. Pirro has been critical of local crime-fighting efforts and has vowed to prosecute gun crime.</s>
